entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming clear after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022
